name: Amazing Shooting Watermelon: G
description:
Amazing Shooting Watermelon: Gun Shoot is the epic new simulation of shooter games in which several watermelons are placed on different platforms and the user has to shoot all of them in a limited time period. In Games, the player has limited bullets and hence he has to take his aim carefully and aim accurately for the target otherwise he might waste his bullets.
Features
- Realistic crushing & smash sound with accurate physics
- Real broken blast & crushed fruits with 3D animation
- Arcade and time attack mode for serious players
- Accuracy will be tested in hard & expert levels
- Easy & intuitive realistic controls for action game
